# Awesome Claude Code

> Claude Code extension for PHP with DDD, CQRS, Clean Architecture generators, and documentation tools.

## Quick Facts

- 11 commands, 29 agents, 127 skills, 10 hooks
- PHP 8.5, PSR-12, readonly classes
- DDD/CQRS/Hexagonal patterns
- Testing, Documentation generation and audit
- MCP servers support (Database, GitHub, etc.)

## Installation

```bash
composer require dykyi-roman/awesome-claude-code
```

Components auto-copy to `.claude/` directory.

## Key Commands

| Command | Purpose |
|---------|---------|
| `/acc-audit-architecture <path>` | Multi-pattern architecture audit |
| `/acc-audit-ddd <path>` | DDD compliance analysis |
| `/acc-audit-psr <path>` | PSR compliance audit |
| `/acc-audit-documentation <path>` | Audit documentation quality |
| `/acc-audit-claude-components` | Audit .claude folder structure |
| `/acc-write-documentation <path>` | Generate documentation |
| `/acc-write-claude-component` | Create commands/agents/skills |
| `/acc-commit` | Auto-generate commit message |
| `/acc-write-test <path>` | Generate tests for file/folder |
| `/acc-audit-test <path>` | Audit test quality |
| `/acc-code-review [branch] [level]` | Multi-level code review |

## Agents

| Agent | Purpose |
|-------|---------|
| `acc-architecture-auditor` | Multi-pattern architecture auditor |
| `acc-ddd-auditor` | DDD compliance auditor |
| `acc-ddd-generator` | DDD component generator |
| `acc-pattern-generator` | Design pattern generator |
| `acc-psr-generator` | PSR implementation generator |
| `acc-documentation-writer` | Technical documentation writer |
| `acc-documentation-auditor` | Documentation quality auditor |
| `acc-diagram-designer` | Mermaid diagram designer |
| `acc-test-auditor` | Test quality auditor |
| `acc-test-generator` | Test generator |

## Skills by Category

### Knowledge (21)
- Architecture: DDD, CQRS, Clean, Hexagonal, Layered, EDA, Event Sourcing
- Patterns: Saga, Outbox, Stability (Circuit Breaker, Retry, Rate Limiter, Bulkhead)
- Principles: SOLID, GRASP, ADR
- Standards: PSR-1/4/12, PSR overview
- Documentation: types, diagrams, QA
- Testing: principles, pyramid, DDD testing

### Analyzers (9)
- SOLID violations, code smells, coupling/cohesion, bounded contexts, immutability, leaky abstractions, encapsulation, test coverage, test smells

### Generators (48)
- DDD: Value Objects, Entities, Aggregates, Domain Events, Repositories, etc.
- CQRS: Commands, Queries, Use Cases, Read Models
- Stability: Circuit Breaker, Retry, Rate Limiter, Bulkhead
- Integration: Saga, Outbox
- Behavioral: Strategy, State, Decorator, Chain of Responsibility, Null Object, Policy
- Creational: Builder, Object Pool, DI Container, Mediator
- ADR: Action, Responder
- PSR: 3, 6, 7, 11, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 20
- Testing: Unit tests, Integration tests, Builders, Mocks, Test doubles

### Templates (9)
- README, Architecture, ADR, API docs
- Getting Started, Troubleshooting
- Code Examples, Mermaid diagrams, Changelog

## Project Structure

```
.claude/
├── commands/        # Slash commands (11)
├── agents/          # Subagents (29)
├── skills/          # Knowledge + generators + analyzers (127)
└── settings.json    # Hooks and permissions
```

## Documentation

- Main README: [README.md](README.md)
- Detailed docs: [docs/](docs/)
- Changelog: [CHANGELOG.md](CHANGELOG.md)

## Usage Examples

```bash
# Audit architecture
/acc-audit-architecture ./src

# Generate documentation
/acc-write-documentation ./src

# Check documentation quality
/acc-audit-documentation ./docs

# Create new DDD component
/acc-create-value-object Email

# Generate tests
/acc-write-test ./src/Domain/Order/

# Audit test quality
/acc-audit-test ./tests
```

v2.5.0 - Code Review system, 40 new analyzer skills
